title: Vervaeke-Pageau 2018 Revisited, 2 Legitimate Ways of Finding Meaning in the Information Age
description:
#vervaeke #pageau #meaning_crisis
My commentary on the John Vervaeke interview here - 
https://youtu.be/2PGglfl5j_I
on Jonathan Pageau's channel. Two approaches to Spirituality​, one more traditionally Western, One that is an approach based on Cog-Sci and Buddhism. Both excellent depending on your temperament and inclination. Both excellent for the problems we face today. Both have Dynamic Quality!!

I read from Chapter 6 of John's book here:
https://books.openedition.org/obp/4274
